title: Director arrested after spending $17M budget for failed Netflix show on crypto, sports cars and divorce fees
description: The director transferred “the funds he received through a number of different bank accounts before consolidating them in a personal brokerage account,” prosecutors said in a news release. He then “used those funds to make a number of personal and speculative purchases of securities,” they said.

title: HC Wainwright Reiterates “Buy” Rating for Bitcoin Depot (NASDAQ:BTM)
description: Bitcoin Depot (NASDAQ:BTM – Get Free Report)‘s stock had its “buy” rating reissued by equities research analysts at HC Wainwright in a research report issued on Tuesday,Benzinga reports. They presently have a $4.00 price objective on the stock. HC Wainwright’s price objective suggests a potential upside of 183.69% from the stock’s previous close. Bitcoin Depot […]
